unpublishedCollection.name: set_container_data
unpublishedCollection.body:
export default { myVar1: [], myVar2: {}, myFun1: (record,tablename) => { if(tablename == "customers"){ return `

Customer#${record.customer_id}

Customer Name: ${record.title} ${record.forename} ${record.surname}

Company Name: ${record.companyname}

Address: ${record.building} ${record.street} ${record.town}

Postcode: ${record.postcode}

Mobile Number: ${record.mobile != "" ? record.mobile : "-"}

E-mail Address: ${record.email != "" ? record.email : "-"}

Created at: ${record.created}

Reminders enabled: ${record.reminders_enabled === 1 ? "Yes" : "No"}

Archived: ${record.archive === 1 ? "Yes" : "No"}

` } else if(tablename =="properties"){ return `

Property ID: ${record.property_id}

Customer ID: ${record.customer_id}

Address: ${record.building} ${record.street} ${record.town}

Postcode: ${record.postcode}

Tenant Mobile Number: ${record.installphone != "" ? record.installphone : " --- "}

Tenant E-mail Address: ${record.email != "" ? record.email : " --- "}

Created at: ${record.created}

Gas Due Date: ${record.gsexpiry}

Archived: ${record.archived === 1 ? "Yes" : "No"}

` } else if(tablename == "jobs"){ return`

Job#${record.job_id}

Property ID:${record.property_id}

Job no: ${record.jobno}

Job Description: ${record.description}

Created on: ${record.created}

Last modified: ${record.modified}

Invoiced: ${record.invoiced === 1 ? "Yes" : "No"}

Archived: ${record.archived === 1 ? "Yes" : "No"}

` } else if(tablename == "appliances"){ return`

Gas Appliance#${record.appliance_id}

Property ID: ${record.property_id}

Appliance Type ID: ${record.appliancetype_id}

Appliance Make ID: ${record.appliancemake_id}

Appliance Model ID: ${record.appliancemodel_id}

Appliance Location ID: ${record.appliancelocation_id}

Serial Number: ${record.serialnumber}

GCN: ${record.gcn}

Archived: ${record.archived === 1 ? "Yes" : "No"}

` } else if(tablename == "invoices"){ return `

Invoice#${record.invoice_id}

Record Type ${record.quote === 0 ? 'Invoice' : record.quote === 1 ? 'Quote' : 'Estimate' }

Invoice no: ${record.invoiceno === null ? record.invoiceno : " --- "}

Issued on: ${record.dateissued}

Customer ID: ${record.customer_id}

Job ID: ${record.job_id}

Email ID: ${record.email_id}

Created on: ${record.created}

Last modified: ${record.modified}

Total Amount: ${record.totalamount}

Amount Paid: ${record.amtpaid}

Archived: ${record.archived === 1 ? "Yes" : "No"}

` } else if(tablename === 'emails'){ return `

Email#${record.email_id}

Job ID: ${record.job_id}

From: ${record.from}

To: ${record.to}

CC: ${record.cc}

Body: ${record.body}

Created on: ${record.created}

Last modified: ${record.modified}

` } else if(tablename === 'costs'){ return `

Cost#${record.cost_id}

Invoice ID: ${record.invoice_id}

Quantity: ${record.quantity}

Unit Price: ${record.unitprice}

VAT rate: ${record.vatrate}

Created on: ${record.created}

Last modified: ${record.modified}

Archived: ${record.archive}

` } else if(tablename === 'gscerts'){ return `

Gas Certificate#${record.gscert_id}

Job ID: ${record.job_id}

Customer ID: ${record.customer_id}

Gas Certificate No: ${record.gascertno}

Email ID: ${record.email_id}

Created on: ${record.created}

Last modified: ${record.modified}

Next Inspection Due Date: ${record.expiry}

Archived: ${record.archive}



Inspection Details

Notes: ${record.notes}

Accessible: ${record.accessible === 0 ? 'NA' : record.accessible === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

Tightness: ${record.tightness === 0 ? 'NA' : record.tightness === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

Pipework Visual Inspection ${record.visual === 0 ? 'NA' : record.visual === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

Bonding: ${record.bonding === 0 ? 'NA' : record.visual === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

CO Alarm fitted: ${record.co_alarm_fitted === '---' ? 'NA' : record.co_alarm_fitted}

CO Alarm tested: ${record.co_alarm_tested === '---' ? 'NA' : record.co_alarm_tested}

Smoke Alarm fitted: ${record.smoke_alarm_fitted === '---' ? 'NA' : record.smoke_alarm_fitted}

Smoke Alarm tested: ${record.smoke_alarm_tested === '---' ? 'NA' : record.smoke_alarm_fitted}

` } else if(tablename === 'gasservices'){ return `

Gas Service#${record.gasservice_id}

Job ID: ${record.job_id}

Customer ID: ${record.customer_id}

Gas Certificate No: ${record.gascertno}

Email ID: ${record.email_id}

Created on: ${record.created}

Last modified: ${record.modified}

Next Inspection Due Date: ${record.duedate}

Archived: ${record.archive}



Safety Checks


Operating Correctly: ${record.operating === 1 ? "Yes" : "No"}

Safety Standards: ${record.currentstds === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

Controls Checked/Adjusted: ${record.controls === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

Pressure: ${record.pressure}

Heat Input: ${record.heat}

Flueing is safe: ${record.fluesafe === 3 ? 'NA' : record.fluesafe === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

Ventilation is Safe: ${record.ventilation === 3 ? 'NA' : record.ventilation === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

Emission/Combustion Test: ${record.emission === '3' ? 'NA' : record.emission === 1 ? 'Pass' : 'Fail'}

Burner pressure/Gas Rate Correct: ${record.burnpress === '3' ? 'NA' : record.burnpress === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

Tightness Test: ${record.tightness === '3' ? 'NA' : record.tightness === 1 ? "Yes" : "No"}



Plumbing Inspection


Air Working Correctly: ${record.working === 3 ? "NA" : record.working === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Hot Water: ${record.hotwater === 3 ? "NA" : record.hotwater === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Timer and Controlls: ${record.timer === 3 ? "NA" : record.timer === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Warm Air/Outlet Grills: ${record.outlet === 3 ? "NA" : record.outlet === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Visible pipework free: ${record.pipework === 3 ? "NA" : record.pipework === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Magnetic System Fitted: ${record.magnet === 3 ? "NA" : record.magnet === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Water Quality Acceptable: ${record.water_quality === 3 ? 'NA' : record.water_quality === 2 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}



Appliance Recommendations


Approved Carbon Monoxide Alarm: ${record.carbonmon === 3 ? "NA" : record.carbonmon === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Appliance is safe: ${record.safe === 3 ? "NA" : record.safe === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

All functional parts available: ${record.function === 3 ? "NA" : record.function === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Safety warning explaned: ${record.warningleft === 3 ? "NA" : record.outlet === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Recommended Appliance Replacement: ${record.replacement === 3 ? "NA" : record.replacement === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

System improvements: ${record.improve === 3 ? "NA" : record.improve === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

` } else if(tablename === 'ndcaterings'){ return `

ND Catering#${record.ndcatering_id}

Job ID: ${record.job_id}

Customer ID: ${record.customer_id}

Gas Certificate No: ${record.gascertno}

Email ID: ${record.email_id}

Created on: ${record.created}

Last modified: ${record.modified}

Archived: ${record.archive}



Gas Installation Details


Emergency Isolation: ${record.gas_isntallation_details[r1]}

Location Satisfactory: ${record.currentstds === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

Accessible: ${record.controls === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

Suitable Valve Type: ${record.pressure}

Valve handle secured in place: ${record.heat}

Emergency notice present: ${record.fluesafe === 3 ? 'NA' : record.fluesafe === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

Gas isolation via automatic electric system? ${record.ventilation === 3 ? 'NA' : record.ventilation === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

System fitted with automatic pressure proving? ${record.emission === '3' ? 'NA' : record.emission === 1 ? 'Pass' : 'Fail'}

Manual reset facility? ${record.burnpress === '3' ? 'NA' : record.burnpress === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

Attached notice regarding resetting? ${record.tightness === '3' ? 'NA' : record.tightness === 1 ? "Yes" : "No"}

Do appropriate appliances have full flame safeguard? ${record.fluesafe === 3 ? 'NA' : record.fluesafe === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

Evidence of corrosion of gas pipework: ${record.ventilation === 3 ? 'NA' : record.ventilation === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

Action required: ${record.emission === '3' ? 'NA' : record.emission === 1 ? 'Pass' : 'Fail'}

Gas installation has been tightness tested: ${record.burnpress === '3' ? 'NA' : record.burnpress === 1 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}

Gas installation tightness satisfactory: ${record.tightness === '3' ? 'NA' : record.tightness === 1 ? "Yes" : "No"}



Plumbing Inspection


Air Working Correctly: ${record.working === 3 ? "NA" : record.working === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Hot Water: ${record.hotwater === 3 ? "NA" : record.hotwater === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Timer and Controlls: ${record.timer === 3 ? "NA" : record.timer === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Warm Air/Outlet Grills: ${record.outlet === 3 ? "NA" : record.outlet === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Visible pipework free: ${record.pipework === 3 ? "NA" : record.pipework === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Magnetic System Fitted: ${record.magnet === 3 ? "NA" : record.magnet === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Water Quality Acceptable: ${record.water_quality === 3 ? 'NA' : record.water_quality === 2 ? 'Yes' : 'No'}



Appliance Recommendations


Approved Carbon Monoxide Alarm: ${record.carbonmon === 3 ? "NA" : record.carbonmon === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Appliance is safe: ${record.safe === 3 ? "NA" : record.safe === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

All functional parts available: ${record.function === 3 ? "NA" : record.function === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Safety warning explaned: ${record.warningleft === 3 ? "NA" : record.outlet === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

Recommended Appliance Replacement: ${record.replacement === 3 ? "NA" : record.replacement === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

System improvements: ${record.improve === 3 ? "NA" : record.improve === 2 ? "No" : "Yes"}

` } else { return null; } } }
